## Cisco-IOS-XR-sysadmin-show-inv.yang

- [XPaths Obsoleted](#xpaths-obsoleted)

### Description

leaf 'index' is not applicable to list 'location'. leaf 'loc' is not applicable to list 'all', list 'chassis', list 'power', list 'fan', list 'raw'.

## XPaths Removed
